connectionError: Kuskuren uwar garken. Da fatan za a sake gwadawa.
loginStep0Explanation: Shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku don farawa.
loginStep1Explanation: Shigar da kalmar wucewa don samun damar asusunku.
step0Subtitle: An yi amfani da shi don shiga
step4Subtitle: Shigar da kalmar wucewa ta sake
signupStep0Explanation: Shigar da adireshin imel ɗin ku don ƙirƙirar asusunku. Hakanan zaka iya amfani da sa hannu na Google don shiga cikin sauri.
signupStep1Explanation: Zaɓi sunan nuninku. Wannan shine yadda sauran masu amfani zasu gan ku akan uChat.
signupStep2Explanation: Tambarin sunan mai amfani yana farawa da alamar @. Wannan na musamman mai ganowa yana taimaka wa wasu su same ku. Babu wani mai amfani da zai iya samun tag iri ɗaya.
signupStep3Explanation: Ƙirƙirar kalmar sirri mai ƙarfi don kare asusunku.
signupStep4Explanation: Tabbatar da kalmar wucewa kuma yarda da sharuɗɗan don kammala rajista.
usernameTooShort: Dole ne sunan nuni ya zama aƙalla haruffa 3
usernameTooLong: Sunan nuni ba zai iya wuce haruffa 30 ba
enterHandle: Ana buƙatar alamar sunan mai amfani
handleTooShort: Dole ne tag sunan mai amfani ya zama aƙalla haruffa 3
handleTooLong: Tambarin sunan mai amfani ba zai iya wuce haruffa 15 ba
handleInvalid: Tambarin sunan mai amfani zai iya ƙunsar haruffa kawai, lambobi, da maƙasudi
handleNoAt: Kar a haɗa da alamar @. Za a ƙara ta atomatik.
passwordTooShort: Dole ne kalmar wucewa ta zama aƙalla haruffa 8
passwordNoUppercase: Dole ne kalmar wucewa ta ƙunshi aƙalla babban harafi ɗaya
passwordNoNumber: Dole ne kalmar wucewa ta ƙunshi aƙalla lamba ɗaya
passwordsNotMatch: Kalmomin sirri ba su dace ba
mustAgreeToTerms: Dole ne ku karɓi sharuɗɗa da sharuɗɗan
emailTaken: An riga an yiwa wannan imel ɗin rijista
handleTaken: An riga an ɗauki wannan alamar sunan mai amfani
